details: A vulnerability was found in shawon100 RUET OJ up to 18fa45b0a669fa1098a0b8fc629cf6856369d9a5. This vulnerability affects unknown code of the file /process.php of the component POST Request Handler. The manipulation of the argument un results in sql injection. The attack can be launched remotely. The exploit has been made public and could be used. This product does not use versioning. This is why information about affected and unaffected releases are unavailable. The vendor was contacted early about this disclosure but did not respond in any way.
